conversations.body_text:
Hi is anyone going to reply to me please

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Your order has been shipped and is expected to arrive on the 25th. I noticed you initiated a chargeback; please remember to cancel it upon receipt.  https://www.evri.com/track/parcel/H01SRA0051981061/details
